item.title: collector-fallacy
item.description: Relevant Notes productivity learning-in-public Notes Fallacy: As you collect, your knowledge grows But what actually happens is that you don’t process and digest these notes Although a lengthy process, take time to convert these notes into ones you actually learn, know, and digest–you don’t learn just by highlighting What we need to focus on is DEVELOP knowledge, not connect Highlights The Collector’s Fallacy • Zettelkasten Method The worst we could do is to pile up copies until the stack grows intimidatingly high, until it becomes unmanageable.
